title: Kentucky Fried Movie Sans Serif
content:
Hi,

wondering what this is exactly...

Thanks!

ac

author: ac54

comments.content:
That's just good old [Helvetica Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124605/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/helvetica/), badly degraded by several generations of copying.  
_Kentucky Fried Movie_ is hilarious, by the way--still one of my favorites.
thanks, although I still doubt that, if you look at the roundness of the C that is totally different with Helvetica?
you could try Swiss. it soooo very close to Helvetica. might be just the change you're looking for.
